settings.securityDescription: Protect your account and keep your data safe
settings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

auth.loginWelcome: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
auth.rememberMeTooltip: Your email will be saved in this browser for easier future logins. Your password is never stored.
auth.acceptTerms: By logging in, you accept our
auth.connectionError: Connection error. Check your internet and try again.

errors.INVALID_CREDENTIALS: The email or password is incorrect. Please verify your data and try again.
errors.OAUTH_ACCOUNT: This account was created with Google. Please log in using the Google button.
errors.TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts.
errors.ACCOUNT_LOCKED: Your account has been temporarily locked for security. Try again later.
errors.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Your email has not been verified yet. Check your inbox.
errors.ACCOUNT_DISABLED: Your account has been disabled. Contact the administrator for more information.

auth.accountCreated: Account created! Please verify your email.

registerErrors.fillAllFields: Please complete all fields to continue.
registerErrors.invalidEmailFormat: The email format is not valid. Example: user@domain.com
registerErrors.passwordMismatch: The passwords entered do not match. Please verify and try again.
registerErrors.weakPassword: The password does not meet the minimum security requirements. Check the indicators above.
registerErrors.EMAIL_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists. Do you want to log in?
registerErrors.INVALID_EMAIL: The email format is not valid.
registerErrors.WEAK_PASSWORD: The password is too weak. Use at least 8 characters with uppercase, numbers and symbols.
registerErrors.REGISTRATION_DISABLED: Registration of new users is temporarily disabled.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.enterCodeDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
twoFactor.enterRecoveryCodeDescription: Enter one of your recovery codes.

setup.title: Set up Two-Factor Authentication
setup.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
setup.step1Description: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
setup.step2Description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to verify
setup.step3Description: Save these recovery codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your device.
setup.manualEntry: Can't scan? Enter this code manually:
setup.enableFailed: Failed to enable 2FA. Check your code and try again.
setup.recoveryCodesWarning: These codes will only be shown once. Save them now!

disable.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable.description: You will need to enter your password and current 2FA code to disable.
disable.warning: Warning: This will make your account less secure.
disable.disableFailed: Failed to disable 2FA. Check your password and code.

status.enableDescription: Protect your account with an authenticator app.
